message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make a deal at $100?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that. How about $95?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $92.50?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $97.50?
I'm getting close to my own limit, but I'm willing to go a bit further. How about $95?
